name: neon-siege
description: Neon Siege — a browser-based 2D shooter with infinite wave survival and neon aesthetics

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -n client,worker,stripe -c cyan,magenta,yellow "npm run dev --workspace=client" "npm run dev --workspace=server-cf" "stripe listen --forward-to http://127.0.0.1:8787/api/credits/webhook"
scripts.dev:no-stripe: concurrently -k -n client,worker -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev --workspace=client" "npm run dev --workspace=server-cf"
scripts.dev:all:infisical: npm run dev:sync-env && npm run dev:all
